author: Bryan Anthony
title: Houzz TV: Let’s Go Island Hopping (89 photos)
text:
Houzz TV Houzz TV: Let’s Go Island Hopping 
Always a popular gathering space, the kitchen island plays a vital role for many families. From stools to countertops to lighting above, the possible combinations are endless. Here’s a collection of some of our favorite kitchen islands with plenty of decorating inspiration. C lick the first image to enlarge the photo, then use the right arrow to see the photos in slideshow format. Flip through, then tell us: Which island best suits your style?
